title: Beliefs about Bots: How Employers Plan for AI in White-Collar WorkWe thank Melanie Arntz, Efi Adamopoulou (discussant), Dietmar Fehr, Gabriel Leite Mariante (discussant), Manuel Menkhoff, Henning Hermes, Cäcilia vom Baur, and the German Federal Chamber of Tax Advisors for insightful comments and discussions, as well as participants at various seminars and conferences for helpful comments. The study was pre-registered in the AEA RCT registry (RCT ID: AEARCTR-0014788). This experiment was reviewed by the Ethics Committee of the University of Mannheim (EC-8/2024). We declare that we have no interests, financial or otherwise, that relate to the research described in this paper. We are grateful to the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG, German Research Foundation) for financial support through CRC TRR 266 Accounting for Transparency (Project-ID 403041268).
